string.value: After all that, you were finally able to convince Robby Fray, the seven star chef, to help. Report the good news to #bLana#k.
Next on the list is getting a makeup artist. Head over to #bTina#k and see if she'll help.
You met and talked with #bTina#k, but it seemed like she wanted you to do something for her first.
Are you serious? You really convinced Robby Fray, the seven star chef, to cater the party? Delightful! We're set for the debut party then. Ready for the next thing on the list?

Excellent. Next, we need a makeup artist. I'm sure you've noticed that Blake needs a miracle to make his face star-worthy. Don't give me that look...it's the way the business goes! Anyway, #bTina#k, who just opened a beauty salon in Kerning Square, can work makeup miracles. Convince her to work with Blake. Drop my name if you have to. She should come crawling then.
Weren't you the one that begged me to give Blake a chance?

Welcome, welcome! You must have heard people raving about what an amaaaazing makeup artist I am. What time was your appointment?\r\n#L0##bI don't have an appointment. I'm here to see if you'd be willing to work with Blake on his debut performance. The CEO of Big Hit Records recommended you.#l\n#k

Blake? You mean Blake at the subway station? Why, I'd love to help him. But I just opened my shop, and I have a ton of things to take care of... Hmm, if you help me on a few things, I'll do Blake's makeup. What do you say?
Think about it for a bit and let me know what you decide.
Convince #bTina#k the makeup artist to help us! If you tell her I've personally requested her, she'll beg to be allowed the job.
